TextBlock.Text: Components: 3 modules connected to central chamber, with double-size gravity cannon attached to front of central module.

A reminder: we must communicate an estimate of the amount of gravity crystals needed to power the gravity cannon to the <color=orange>Gravity Crystal Workshop</color> on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> soon!
Each chamber will be equipped with projection pools and walls to facilitate swift communication of information between Nomai aboard each module.
Crafting of new projection stones is to be conveyed to Daz at the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop.</color>
CASSAVA: I shall be returning to Statue Island soon. I would be happy to convey this message to the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> during my visit!
PRIVET: Of course you will. Send Daz my regards, Cassava!
